page.title: 14 Victoria Park.
page.content: } Life on our estate is a close-knit community. Faces are often familiar and anyone is welcome. It is a small and compact area, with efficient shopping facilities and leisure resources. The houses are made from brick and cement, and a modern mixture of materials to use for a house. The houses are usually three-bedroomed with a front room, a kitchen and a bathroom and some have dining rooms downstairs. If you wish you can buy your own house, and add an extension. The roads are pretty scruffy, with litter blowing down the street gutters. The play-park is a mess, and there is broken glass and coke cans littering the floor. There are two schools near the estate, one is mixed and one is a girls school.
